title: Coupon Page
networkError:
A network error occurred.
Please try again shortly.
invalidServerName:
Invalid server name.
Please select from the server list.
invalidAccountName:
Invalid email format.
Please enter a valid recovery email.
invalidCouponCode:
Invalid coupon code.
It must consist of 8 to 12 uppercase letters and numbers.
INVALID_ACCOUNT:
Invalid account.
Please check the server.
INVALID_COUPON:
Invalid coupon.
Please check the coupon code again.
NO_ACCOUNT:
Account not found.
Please recheck the recovery email.
BLOCKED_ACCOUNT:
This account is permanently blocked.
Please contact customer service.
USED_COUPON: This coupon has already been used.
SYSTEM_ERROR:
A system error occurred while processing the task.
Please try again shortly.
